subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Amputation
Track and Field
Disabilities
lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius, the South African double amputee who struggled for six years to reach the Olympics, made history by competing in a first-round 400-meter heat and advancing to the semifinals.
snippet: Oscar Pistorius, the South African double amputee who struggled for six years to reach the Olympics, made history by competing in a first-round 400-meter heat and advancing to the semifinals.
